entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 7:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
